author: dreiss
msg: Fix a bug with Perl's TSocket and THttpClient.
The underlying Perl library expects timeouts in seconds, but the
documentation for the Thrift classes says the should be in milliseconds.
This changes divides timeouts by 1000 to make that the case.

author: dreiss
msg: Allow nested namespaces to be used in perl.

author: dreiss
msg: Update to the latest version of AX_BOOST_BASE.
It now has the license right in the file.

author: dreiss
msg: Fix some small bugs in the Perl generator.

author: dweatherford
msg: Summary: Avoid segfaulting via calling zend_fetch_class_entry on something
that might not actually be an object; throw an exception instead.
